channel.title: How to Crack DRM video, Convert HD video and Mod video
channel.description:
DRM Video, HD Video, Mod Video are all special video formats. They are important and popular but can not be accepted by most portable devices. This guides is introduced to help people change the video formats above to general videos.
It includes three parts: [b]1: How to Remove DRM Protection of DRM video and convert video. [/b] [b]2: How to Convert HD Video (HD TS, MTS, M2TS, MKV, MP4,Etc). [/b] [b]3: How to Convert Mod Video [/b]
[b]1: How to Remove DRM Protection of DRM video and convert video. [/b]
[b][url=http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/media-converter-pro-daniu.html]Daniusoft Digital Media Converter[/url][/b] software is the quickest and easiest solution to remove drm from WMV, M4V, M4P, WMA, M4A, AAC, M4B, AA files by quick recording. You can use this professional tool to crack drm and put them on your iPod/iPhone 3G/PSP/Zune/Sansa View/iRiver…… The process is as follows:
Step 0: Download [b][url=http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/download/daniu/daniu-digital-media-converter-pro_full310_556168.exe]Daniusoft Digital Media Converter[/url][/b], install and run it.
[img]http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/images/guides/drm-hd-mod/1.gif[/img]
Step 1: Run the software and click “Add…” button to load WMA or M4A, M4B, AAC, WMV, M4P, M4V, ASF files
Step 2: Choose output formats. If you want to convert protected audio files, please select “Convert audio to” list; If you want to convert protected video files, please select “Convert video to” list.
Step 3: You can click “Settings” button to custom preference for output files. Click “Settings” button bellow “Convert audio to” list for protected audio files Click “Settings” button bellow “Convert video to” list for protected video files
Step 4: Start remove DRM and convert your DRM protected music and videos by click on “Start” button.
You can also use [b][url=http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/media-converter-daniu.html]Daniusoft Media Converter[/url][/b] to convert DRM Video or audio.
[b]2: How to Convert HD Video (HD TS, MTS, M2TS, MKV, MP4,Etc). [/b]
Step 1: Download [b][url=http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/download/ai/hd-video-converter.exe]Aiseesoft HD Video Converter[/url][/b] , then install and run this program.
[img]http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/images/guides/ai-hd/hd-video-converter1.jpg[/img]
Step 2: Load the HD video files you want to convert Click the "Add File" button to browse your computer hard disc and add the HD video files you want to convert to the program.
Step 3: Output Settings After you added HD Video files, you can select an output format for each video file and specify a directory on your computer to save the output files.
Step 4: Edit HD Video
1. Adjust Effect Click "Effect" button to open the edit window to adjust the video effects.
[img]http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/images/guides/ai-hd/hd-video-converter4.jpg[/img]
Brightness: Drag the Brightness adjustment bar to set the brightness of the video. Contrast: Drag the Contrast adjustment bar to set the contrast of the video. Saturation: Drag the Saturation adjustment bar to set the saturation of the video. Volume: Drag the Volume adjustment bar to adjust the volume of the audio.
2. Trim video clips Click "Trim"button to open the edit window to trim any video clips.
[img]http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/images/guides/ai-hd/hd-video-converter5.jpg[/img]
3. Crop video play ragion Click "Crop" button to open the edit window to customize the video play region.
[img]http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/images/guides/ai-hd/hd-video-converter6.jpg[/img]
Step 5: Start the conversion Click the Convert button to start conversion and then you can just go out for a walk or take a nap, and the conversion may have been finished when you come back: )
[b]3: How to Convert Mod Video [/b]
MOD and TOD are informal names of tapeless video formats used by JVC (MOD and TOD), Panasonic (MOD only) and Canon (MOD only) in some models of digital camcorders. It can’t be accepted by most portable devices. If people want to enjoy Mod/Tod video on PC or portable media player they should first convert their Mod/Tod Video to general video.
[b][url=http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/mod-video-converter-ai.html]Aiseesoft Mod Converter[/url][/b]------A powerful Mod Converter software which can convert MOD Video, TOD files to all popular video and audio formats with fast conversion speed and excellent quality. It can convert Mod/Tod for iPod, iPhone, PSP, Zune, Zen, Walkman, Blackberry, iRiver, Archos and so on.
This guide shows you how to convert Mod/Tod video to commen video formats step-by-step.
Step 0: Download, Install and run [b][url=http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/download/ai/mod-video-converter.exe]Aiseesoft Mod Video Converter[/url][/b].
[img]http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/images/guides/mod/mod-converter-start.jpg[/img]
Step 1: Add files Click “Add File” to add your video files.
Step 2: Set output video format Click “Profile” button from the drop-down list to select the output video format such as AVI, MPG, MPEG and WMV. You can click the “Settings” button to set parameters of your output video such as Frame Rate, Bitrate to get the best video quality as you want.
Step 3: Click the “Start” button to start the conversion.
[b]Tips: [/b] 1: How to join your Mod/Tod videos If you want to merge several Mod/Tod videos into one file you can choose them and click the “Merge into one file” to do it.
2: How to split your Mod/Tod video The “Trim” function also servers as a video splitter. You can set the “Start Time” and “End Time” to set the time of the clip or you can directly drag the slide bar to the accurate position. After cutting your Mod/Tod videos into small clips you can upload them to YouTube, Myspace and so on to share your video with people of the world.
[img]http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/images/guides/mod/mod-converter-trim.jpg[/img]
3: How to crop your Mod/Tod video size By using the “Crop” function you can crop the black edge of your video and you can also drag the line around the video image to adjust your video to your mobile devices. With it you can enjoy and share your DV with other people anytime andanywhere.
[img]http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/images/guides/mod/mod-converter-crop.jpg[/img]
4: How to save your favorite picture If you like the current image of the video you can use the “Snapshot” option. Just click the “Snapshot” button the image will be saved and you can click the “Open” button next to “Snapshot” button to open your picture.
Mutimedia Studio recommend some other professional multimedia tools: 1: [url=http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/media-converter-pro-daniu.html]daniusoft media converter pro[/url]-Remove DRM from Video and Convert Video. 2: [url=http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/ts-converter-4.html]TS Converter[/url]-Convert between HD TS Video and General Video. 3: [url=http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/dvd-audio-extractor-avc.html]DVD Audio Extractor[/url]-Extract and convert audio from DVD movie. 4: [url=http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/ipod-to-mac-transfer-imac.html]iPod to Mac Transfer[/url]-Transfer iPod files to iPod, Mac and iTunes. 5: [url=http://www.mac-dvd-ripper-soft.com/iphone-to-mac-transfer-imac.html]iPhone to Mac Transfer[/url]-Backup iPhone video, music, photo, playlist, podcast, tv show to iPod, iPhone, Mac or iTunes.

item.title: How to Crack DRM video, Convert HD video and Mod video
item.dc:creator: @molliegetty molliegetty
item.description:
@molliegetty wrote:

DRM Video, HD Video, Mod Video are all special video formats.
They are important and popular but can not be accepted by most portable devices.
This guides is introduced to help people change the video formats above to general videos.

It includes three parts:
1: How to Remove DRM Protection of DRM video and convert video.
2: How to Convert HD Video (HD TS, MTS, M2TS, MKV, MP4,Etc).
3: How to Convert Mod Video

1: How to Remove DRM Protection of DRM video and convert video.

Daniusoft Digital Media Converter software is the quickest and easiest solution to remove drm from WMV, M4V, M4P, WMA, M4A, AAC, M4B, AA files by quick recording. You can use this professional tool to crack drm and put them on your iPod/iPhone 3G/PSP/Zune/Sansa View/iRiver……
The process is as follows:

Step 0: Download Daniusoft Digital Media Converter, install and run it.

Step 1: Run the software and click “Add…” button to load WMA or M4A, M4B, AAC, WMV, M4P, M4V, ASF files

Step 2: Choose output formats. If you want to convert protected audio files, please select “Convert audio to” list; If you want to convert protected video files, please select “Convert video to” list.

Step 3: You can click “Settings” button to custom preference for output files.
Click “Settings” button bellow “Convert audio to” list for protected audio files
Click “Settings” button bellow “Convert video to” list for protected video files

Step 4: Start remove DRM and convert your DRM protected music and videos by click on “Start” button.

You can also use Daniusoft Media Converter to convert DRM Video or audio.

2: How to Convert HD Video (HD TS, MTS, M2TS, MKV, MP4,Etc).

Step 1: Download Aiseesoft HD Video Converter , then install and run this program.

Step 2: Load the HD video files you want to convert
Click the “Add File” button to browse your computer hard disc and add the HD video files you want to convert to the program.

Step 3: Output Settings
After you added HD Video files, you can select an output format for each video file and specify a directory on your computer to save the output files.

Step 4: Edit HD Video

  1. Adjust Effect
    Click “Effect” button to open the edit window to adjust the video effects.

Brightness: Drag the Brightness adjustment bar to set the brightness of the video.
Contrast: Drag the Contrast adjustment bar to set the contrast of the video.
Saturation: Drag the Saturation adjustment bar to set the saturation of the video.
Volume: Drag the Volume adjustment bar to adjust the volume of the audio.

  1. Trim video clips
    Click "Trim"button to open the edit window to trim any video clips.

  1. Crop video play ragion
    Click “Crop” button to open the edit window to customize the video play region.

Step 5: Start the conversion
Click the Convert button to start conversion and then you can just go out for a walk or take a nap, and the conversion may have been finished when you come back: )

3: How to Convert Mod Video

MOD and TOD are informal names of tapeless video formats used by JVC (MOD and TOD), Panasonic (MOD only) and Canon (MOD only) in some models of digital camcorders. It can’t be accepted by most portable devices. If people want to enjoy Mod/Tod video on PC or portable media player they should first convert their Mod/Tod Video to general video.

Aiseesoft Mod Converter------A powerful Mod Converter software which can convert MOD Video, TOD files to all popular video and audio formats with fast conversion speed and excellent quality. It can convert Mod/Tod for iPod, iPhone, PSP, Zune, Zen, Walkman, Blackberry, iRiver, Archos and so on.

This guide shows you how to convert Mod/Tod video to commen video formats step-by-step.

Step 0: Download, Install and run Aiseesoft Mod Video Converter.

Step 1: Add files
Click “Add File” to add your video files.

Step 2: Set output video format
Click “Profile” button from the drop-down list to select the output video format such as AVI, MPG, MPEG and WMV. You can click the “Settings” button to set parameters of your output video such as Frame Rate, Bitrate to get the best video quality as you want.

Step 3: Click the “Start” button to start the conversion.

Tips:
1: How to join your Mod/Tod videos
If you want to merge several Mod/Tod videos into one file you can choose them and click the “Merge into one file” to do it.

2: How to split your Mod/Tod video
The “Trim” function also servers as a video splitter. You can set the “Start Time” and “End Time” to set the time of the clip or you can directly drag the slide bar to the accurate position. After cutting your Mod/Tod videos into small clips you can upload them to YouTube, Myspace and so on to share your video with people of the world.

3: How to crop your Mod/Tod video size
By using the “Crop” function you can crop the black edge of your video and you can also drag the line around the video image to adjust your video to your mobile devices. With it you can enjoy and share your DV with other people anytime andanywhere.

4: How to save your favorite picture
If you like the current image of the video you can use the “Snapshot” option. Just click the “Snapshot” button the image will be saved and you can click the “Open” button next to “Snapshot” button to open your picture.

Mutimedia Studio recommend some other professional multimedia tools:
1: daniusoft media converter pro-Remove DRM from Video and Convert Video.
2: TS Converter-Convert between HD TS Video and General Video.
3: DVD Audio Extractor-Extract and convert audio from DVD movie.
4: iPod to Mac Transfer-Transfer iPod files to iPod, Mac and iTunes.
5: iPhone to Mac Transfer-Backup iPhone video, music, photo, playlist, podcast, tv show to iPod, iPhone, Mac or iTunes.
